member.name: T:GeoTimeZone.TimeZoneLookup
member.summary: Provides the time zone lookup functionality.

member.name: M:GeoTimeZone.TimeZoneLookup.GetTimeZone(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines the IANA time zone for given location coordinates.
member.returns: A object, which contains the result(s) of the operation.

member.name: T:GeoTimeZone.TimeZoneResult
member.summary: Contains the result of a time zone lookup operation.

member.name: P:GeoTimeZone.TimeZoneResult.Result
member.summary: Gets the primary result of the time zone lookup operation.

member.name: P:GeoTimeZone.TimeZoneResult.AlternativeResults
member.summary: Gets any alternative results of the time zone lookup operation. This usually happens very close to borders between time zones.
